name: Acme Synthetic Chemicals - Linoleic Acid 99%
description: Acme Synthetic Chemicals offers ultra-high purity Linoleic Acid (99% minimum by gas chromatography). This essential Omega-6 polyunsaturated fatty acid is critical for skin barrier function, anti-inflammatory action, and moisture retention. Linoleic acid deficiency is associated with compromised barrier function and increased transepidermal water loss.
notes: Ultra-high purity (99% by GC) ensures optimal performance in barrier repair formulations. Linoleic acid is essential for maintaining skin barrier integrity and reducing inflammation. CAS 60-33-3. Affordable pricing makes it accessible for various formulation applications.
